Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.match

Class IndependentPlayerMatchManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.match.MatchManager
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.match.IndependentPlayerMatchManager
public class IndependentPlayerMatchManager extends MatchManager
This Class represent the MatchManager in the case of single Players Match

  • Method Details

    • addPlayer

      protected void addPlayer(String nickname, Wizard wiz, int maxTowerCount, int initialCoins) throws InvalidPlayerCountException, IncorrectConstructorParametersException
      Initialize the Player with all the parameters and adds it to the match
      Specified by:
      addPlayer in class MatchManager
      Parameters:
      nickname - (type String) Player's nickname
      wiz - (type Wizard) chosen Wizard
      maxTowerCount - (type int) max number of Tower
      initialCoins - (type int) the number of coins the Player owns at the beginning of the game. Set it to -1 when the Coins feature is disabled
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerCountException - whenever the Player count isn't correct
      IncorrectConstructorParametersException - whenever the Parameters of the constructor aren't correct

    • getPlayerTeamName

      protected String getPlayerTeamName(Player player)
      Description copied from class: MatchManager
      Retrieves the team name for a Player, in case the Match is team based
      Specified by:
      getPlayerTeamName in class MatchManager
      Parameters:
      player - The Player for which to find the team name
      Returns:
